manual.text: Spectre AMS Designer Cosimulation with MathWorks MATLAB/Simulink
manual.description: Describes how to cosimulate a system containing analog and mixed-signal subsystems using the Virtuoso AMS Designer simulator and MathWorks MATLAB/Simulink
